== Shortcuts ==

  | xsel -b          => (neomutt) Pipe to clipboard
  Ctrl+Shift+h/j/k/l => (tmux) navigate tmux panes (autokey)
  gd                 => (vim) Goto definition
  di"                => (vim) Delete in ",(,{, etc

=== Chrome/cVim ===
  Ctrl+Shift+T => Open last closed tab
  Shift+h/l    => Navigate forward/backward
  gF/f         => cVim cycle through frames / go to root frame
  : or /       => cVim open up command or search input
  gi           => cVim go to first input box
  gy           => cVim yank link to clipboard
  zi/zo/z0     => cVim zoom in / zoom out / zoom original
  b            => cVim search through bookmarks

=== i3 ===

  mod+left/right/up/down => snap to left/right/top/bottom
  mod+Shift+PgUp/PgDown  => snap to center
  mod+Shift+g (gap mode) => o / i (outer/inner) => + / - / 0 (shift for global)
  mod+space              => change focus between tiling / floating windows
  mod+shift+space        => toggle float window mode
  mod+j/k                => next / previous workspace
  mod+c / mod+t          => show/hide floating chrome/terminal

=== Surfing Keys (using Vimium instead) ===
  ?        => Show help keys
  I/Ctrl+i => Open vim editor in text box

=== VimWiki Notes ===

  <Leader>ww  – Open the default wiki index file
  <Leader>ws  – Select and open wiki index file
  <Enter>     – Follow/Create wiki link
  <Backspace> – Go back to parent(previous) wiki link
  <Tab>       – Find next wiki link
  <Shift-Tab> – Find previous wiki link
